content: Which song would you like to challenge? We'll select the track based on participants' votes~ (test)
If you'd like to join, you can sign up first. We'll start once we have enough participants. (test)
Alright, feel free to come find me anytime if you want to play! (test)
Welcome to the Street Market Stage! Do you dare to join our dance competition? (test)
In short, just follow my dance moves, watch my reactions carefully, and repeat them when it's your turn! (test)
